name: ficusjs
description: FicusJS is a set of lightweight functions for developing applications using web components

scripts.build:all: rollup -i src/index.js -o dist/index.js -f es -p 'terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}'
scripts.build:component: rollup -i src/component.js -o dist/component.js -f es -p 'terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}'
scripts.build:event: rollup -i src/event.js -o dist/event.js -f es -p 'terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}'
scripts.build:store: rollup -i src/store.js -o dist/store.js -f es -p 'terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}'

author: Matt Levy
